String.string: Anya calls upon Tiaran the Sorrow Tree to protect you!
The Argon Predator is up to something...
The Argon Predator summons an argon spike.
The argon spike pulls you into the Argon Predator's clutches!
The Argon Predator prepares to deal a killing blow.
Every time you try to remove Anya from the dream chamber, Tiaran shudders ominously.
Argon energy crackles through the temple.
When fighting huge monsters, it is important to use your <font color='#ffe761'>skills and dodge</font> at the right time.
You need to <font color='#ffd700'>dodge</font> attacks and use your <font color='#ffe761'>skills effectively</font>.
Pay attention to your classâ€™ skill EP and use it well to improve your development.
Come quickly and lend me your strength!
